name: 3dClusterize
author: AFNI Developers
description: A tool for voxelwise thresholding and clusterizing of datasets.

inputs.description: Load in a dataset for thresholding and clusterizing
inputs.name: Input dataset

inputs.description: Load in a dataset to use as a mask
inputs.name: Mask dataset

inputs.description: Use internal mask from dataset header
inputs.name: Mask from header flag

inputs.description: Specify to dump the utilized mask as a dataset
inputs.name: Output mask name

inputs.description: Specify the sub-brick to use as the threshold source
inputs.name: Threshold sub-brick

inputs.description: Specify the sub-brick to use as the data source
inputs.name: Data sub-brick

inputs.description: Perform one-sided testing
inputs.name: One-sided testing

inputs.description: Perform two-sided testing
inputs.name: Two-sided testing

inputs.description: Perform bisided testing
inputs.name: Bisided testing

inputs.description: Keep values within the range [AA, BB]
inputs.name: Within range values

inputs.description: Specify the number of voxel neighbors (1: 6, 2: 18, 3: 26)
inputs.name: Number of neighbors

inputs.description: Specify the minimum cluster size in terms of number of voxels
inputs.name: Minimum cluster size by voxels

inputs.description: Specify the minimum cluster size by volume in microliters
inputs.name: Minimum cluster size by volume

inputs.description: Prefix/filename of the output map of cluster ROIs
inputs.name: Output map prefix

inputs.description: Output a cluster-masked version of the data volume
inputs.name: Output cluster-masked data

inputs.description: Write output in 1D format
inputs.name: 1D format output

inputs.description: Do not write output in 1D format
inputs.name: No 1D format output

inputs.description: Write out only the total nonzero voxel count and volume for each dataset
inputs.name: Summarize output

inputs.description: Suppress printout of the totals
inputs.name: Suppress totals

inputs.description: Suppress all non-essential output
inputs.name: Quiet mode

inputs.description: Output an empty volume if no clusters are found
inputs.name: Output volume if no clusters

inputs.description: Coordinate order in the output report table (default: RAI)
inputs.name: Output orientation

inputs.description: Use absolute values for mean and SEM in report table
inputs.name: Absolute table data

inputs.description: Turn output map of cluster ROIs into a binary mask
inputs.name: Binary output

output-files.description: Cluster-masked version of the data volume
output-files.name: Output data file
